articles.title: Trump and Putin Meet in Alaska to Discuss Ukraine Conflict
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin met in Alaska to discuss the ongoing war in Ukraine but failed to reach an agreement on a ceasefire or broader deal.

articles.title: PBS News Weekend Full Episode – August 16, 2025
articles.description: Coverage includes Trump's alignment with Putin after their summit, a White House plan affecting children's health, and AI-generated models impacting the fashion industry.

articles.title: Latest News Bulletin | August 16th, 2025 – Evening
articles.description: Catch up with the most important stories from around Europe and beyond, including updates on the Trump-Putin meeting and other global events.
